name: EFFECT OF LOVE
description:
My first game made a long time ago...

EFFECT OF LOVE is a game about love - that's enough for you to play it. ;)
- - - - - - - - - -
Gameplay
- - - - - - - - - -
To proceed to the next scene, you must collect 1024 scores.

*remembering that if you die on the scene black and white scores are not counted.
- - - - - - - - - -
Controls
- - - - - - - - - -
Arrow keys to move the character;
Z to change the background color
X to change the picture black and white

*this game also support gamepad
- - - - - - - - - -
Sounds
- - - - - - - - - -
oldDog_-_We_are_in_love
sound effects by sfxr

- - - - - - - - - - []> Created with Game Maker
